title: Cuban cigar sales light up despite Trump policy
text:
Cuban cigar sales light up despite Trump policy 11:57am EST - 01:15 
Cuba's annual cigar extravaganza has kicked off in Havana attracting wealthy tobacco aficionados and retailers from around the globe. As Sonia Legg reports, a surge in sales of Cuba's legendary cigars in China helped one manufacturer's global revenue rise 12 percent to hit a record $500 million last year. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
